item.title: Item editting help
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Im creating a custom in game price checker all manual work. it will be done separately for specific items , so i added this to actionhandler.java it didnt work , then i added it to clickingbuttons.java it didnt work. i dont know what else to do. someone help ? 3214 is the button i think it is. when i click it , my source says 13738 3214 128. so im assuming 3214 is the button. i added the option in client itemdef2 so it would help. now i need to know what to do source side ?

	case 3214:
	c.sendMessage("Arcane Spirit Shield Worth 700m gold coins");			
	break;
